*** Settings ***
Library           ../CodeLibWrapper.py

*** Keywords ***
KW_About_Information
    ${Output}    Show About Information
    [Return]    ${Output}

KW_About_SendMailToAuthor
    [Arguments]    ${FromEmailAddress}    ${EmailBody}
    ${SendFlag}    Send Email To Admin    ${FromEmailAddress}    ${EmailBody}
    [Return]    ${SendFlag}
